name: FEDERAL INJURY CENTERS
firms: PROSPERING SOLUTIONS, LLC FKA JOHN C. SNYDER III
sampleDescriptions: Work on expanding what type of medical provider may submit reports to OWCP
Advocated with members of Congress and staff regarding changes to the FICA billing codes. I asked congressional staff to advocate on behalf of providers to the department of labor.
